name: Time Loader and Biped Bundle
description:
Time Loader is now available on GOG.COM accompanied by a 10% discount for the owners of Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous, Biped, The Uncertain: Light At The End, or The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day that will last until 17th November 2021, 2 PM UTC.

Also, the Time Loader’s release comes with a surprise – until 17th November 2021, 2 PM UTC, every purchase of this game or its pack with Biped will be accompanied by a free copy of The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day.


I am a Robot Bundle
Venture forth into a world of exciting robotic adventures! In this bundle, you’ll get to meet some of the most exciting robotic protagonists and explore the known world from a completely different perspective!

First, you’ll travel to the charming nostalgic world of Time Loader. Together with your little steel friend, you have the hard task of reversing some very unfortunate events of the past. But what price will you have to pay in the future? After all, even a tiny change can lead to the most unexpected events. Tread carefully, Time Travelers.

When your journey is over, and you’re back to the present, join the fun with Aku and Silla — a pair of bipedal robots on their bonding adventure! Enjoy it solo or grab a friend or a family member and have a blast together in co-op mode. Controlling a bipedal robot might not be easy, but it sure is fun! Will you be able to complete all challenges and master the bipedal art?


I am a Robot Bundle includes:
- Time Loader
- Biped

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
